article.title: The eMERGE Survey I: Very Large Array 5.5 GHz observations of the GOODS-North Field

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the primary beam size (FWHM) of the Lovell telescope at 5.5 GHz?
What percentage of the mapped area in the 5.5 GHz mosaic has an r.m.s. noise below 3 ÂµJy?
What criterion is used to classify a radio source as "unresolved" based on the ratio of total to peak flux density (St/Sp)?
choices: St/Sp below the lower solid-line envelope

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the ratio (Omin Omaj)/(bmin bmaj) represent in Formula (1)?
choices: Ratio of source size to synthesized beam size
Ratio of peak to total flux density
